about.description: Tournado is a comprehensive tournament management platform designed to streamline the organization and management of sports tournaments for organizations and teams.
about.title: About Tournado

competition.description: Manage tournament groups, matches, and standings.
competition.groupStageDescription: Create and manage groups in the group stage
competition.title: Competition Management

reports.description: View platform usage and tournament statistics.
reports.title: Reports & Analytics

auth.unauthorizedSuperAdminRequired: You need super administrator privileges to access this page. Contact your super admin for access.

competition.groupsRange: Number of groups must be between 2 and 8
competition.slotsRange: Teams per group must be between 3 and 10

features.description: Tournado provides all the tools you need to manage your sports tournaments efficiently. From team registration to match scheduling, we've got you covered.
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your tournaments
features.title: Tournament Management Made Easy

hero.description: Manage your sports tournaments with ease. Create, organize, and track your teams and matches in one place.

auth.emailExists: A user already exists with this email
auth.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this page

profile.description: Manage your profile settings and account information for tournament management.
profile.title: Profile Information

android.chrome: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Install app"
android.samsung: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Add page to" then "Home screen"
android.title: Install this app on your device

ios.chrome: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.firefox: Tap the hamburger menu then "Share" and "Add to Home Screen"
ios.safari: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.title: Install this app on your iPhone

other.instruction: Open browser menu and select "Add to Home Screen"
other.title: Install this app on your device
